page.title: 11Cleveland Bridge, Darlington
page.content: {The Cleveland Bridge Company moved to a new modern factory in 1983. Our dinner-lady's house overlooks the gap left when the old factory was pulled down and we asked her what changes it has brought. {GH: } My house is now much colder. We are spending more on heating. { Are there any other changes? {GH:} We now hear all the traffic from Neasham Road. We also hear the railway trains more and the bells from St John's Church. { Is there anything you miss? {GH:} The talk and laughter of the men when they were going to work. { What is going to happen to the empty {site? {GH:} Old people's houses were to be built but lead poison from paint was found in the ground, and now the land has to be left for 5 years.{ T.Baxter
